idiom.example: After losing the championship, the athlete trained with extraordinary dedication for years to finally win

shortDescription: This perseverance idiom combines two historical stories of determined revenge. It references King Goujian of Yue who slept on brushwood (卧薪) to remember his humiliation and Wu Zixu who tasted bile (尝胆) to never forget his family's execution.
